name: cnvepimaex

stmt.origin: mpancom(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))

stmt.origin: olcs(wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(ccnv(cep), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
-| wi(wo(wcel(ccnv(cep), universe), wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))
-| wi(wo(wcel(ccnv(cep), universe), wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wo(wcel(ccnv(cep), universe), wa(wcel(cres(ccnv(cep), c0), universe), wcel(c0, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cep), c0), universe))

comment: The image of converse epsilon exists, proof via ~ imaexALTV (see also ~ cnvepima and ~ uniexg for alternate way). (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Mar-2023.)
